text.p: Shadowrun 6 v0.1 ruleset for Fantasy Grounds.

The Topps Company, Inc. has sole ownership of the names, logo, artwork, marks, photographs, sounds, audio, video and/or any proprietary material used in connection with the game Shadowrun. The Topps Company, Inc. has granted permission to the author of this ruleset to use such names, logos, artwork, marks and/or any proprietary materials for promotional and informational purposes in this ruleset but does not endorse, and is not affiliated with SmiteWorks or the author in any official capacity whatsoever.

parachuting.name: Parachuting
parachuting.specializations: BASE Jumping, HALO, Low Altitude, Recreational (standard skydiving), Static Line

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.specializations: Gut Check, Morale, Persuasion, Strategy, Tactics

forgery.name: Forgery
forgery.specializations: Counterfeiting, Credstick Forgery, False ID, Image Doctoring, Paper Forgery

astralcombat.name: Astral Combat
astralcombat.specializations: By specific foci types or opponents (Weapon Foci, Magicians, Spirits, Wards, etc.)

pilotaerospace.name: Pilot Aerospace
pilotaerospace.specializations: Deep Space, Launch Craft, Remote Operation, Semiballistic, Suborbital

climbing.name: Climbing
climbing.specializations: Assisted, Freehand, Rappelling, by condition (rock climbing, ice climbing, building scaling, etc.)

escapeartist.name: Escape Artist
escapeartist.specializations: By restraint (Ropes, Cuffs, Zip Ties, etc.)

locksmith.name: Locksmith
locksmith.specializations: By lock type (Combination, Cylinder, Pin Tumbler, Safe, etc.)

etiquette.name: Etiquette
etiquette.specializations: By culture or subculture (High Society, Street Gang, Mafia, Catholic Church, Corporate, Media, Goblin Rock, etc.)

gymnastics.name: Gymnastics
gymnastics.specializations: Balance, Breakfall, Dance, Jumping, Parkour, Tumbling

blades.name: Blades
blades.specializations: Axes, Cyber-Implant Blades, Knives, Swords, Parrying

infiltration.name: Infiltration
infiltration.specializations: Urban, Vehicle, Wilderness, by detection method (Motion Sensors, Pressure Pads, Thermal Imagers, etc.)

summoning.name: Summoning
summoning.specializations: By spirit type (Spirits of Fire, Spirits of Water, etc.)

pilotgroundcraft.name: Pilot Ground Craft
pilotgroundcraft.specializations: Bike, Hovercraft, Remote Operation, Tracked, Wheeled

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.specializations: By spell type (Combat Spells, Detection Spells, etc.)

pilotaircraft.name: Pilot Aircraft
pilotaircraft.specializations: Fixed-Wing, Lighter-Than-Air, Remote Operation, Rotary Wing, Tilt Wing, Vectored Thrust

heavyweapons.name: Heavy Weapons
heavyweapons.specializations: Assault Cannon, Grenade Launchers, Guided Missiles, Machine Guns, Rocket Launchers

gunnery.name: Gunnery
gunnery.specializations: Artillery, Ballistic, Energy, Guided Missile, Rocket

binding.name: Binding
binding.specializations: By spirit type (Spirits of Air, Spirits of Earth, etc.)

automatics.name: Automatics
automatics.specializations: Assault Rifles, Carbines, Machine Pistols, Submachine Guns

counterspelling.name: Counterspelling
counterspelling.specializations: By spell type (Combat Spells, Detection Spells, etc.)

ritualspellcasting.name: Ritual Spellcasting
ritualspellcasting.specializations: By spell type (Combat Spells, Detection Spells, etc.)

clubs.name: Clubs
clubs.specializations: Batons, Hammers, Saps, Staves (two-handed clubs), Parrying

pilotwatercraft.name: Pilot Watercraft
pilotwatercraft.specializations: Motorboat, Remote Operation, Sail, Ship, Submarine

banishing.name: Banishing
banishing.specializations: By spirit type (Spirits of Air, Spirits of Fire, etc.)

diving.name: Diving
diving.specializations: Liquid Breathing Apparatus, Mixed Gas, Oxygen Extraction, SCUBA, by condition (Arctic, Cave, Commercial, Military, etc.)

unarmedcombat.name: Unarmed Combat
unarmedcombat.specializations: Cyber-Implants, Martial Arts, Subdual Combat, Parrying

instruction.name: Instruction
instruction.specializations: By Active or Knowledge skill category (Combat, Language, Magical, Academic Knowledge, Street Knowledge, etc.)

survival.name: Survival
survival.specializations: Desert, Forest, Jungle, Mountain, Polar, Urban, other appropriate terrain

firstaid.name: First Aid
firstaid.specializations: By type of treatment (Chemical Burns, Combat Wounds, Sports Injuries, Electric Shock, etc.)

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.specializations: Desert, Forest, Jungle, Mountain, Polar, Urban, other appropriate terrain

arcana.name: Arcana
arcana.specializations: Spell Design (by spell category), Focus Design (by focus type), Ally Spirit Formula, Free Spirit Formula

assensing.name: Assensing
assensing.specializations: Aura Reading, Astral Signatures, Psychometry, by aura type (Metahumans, Spirits, Foci, Wards, etc.)

navigation.name: Navigation
navigation.specializations: Desert, Forest, Jungle, Mountain, Polar, Urban, other appropriate terrain

aeronauticsmechanic.name: Aeronautics Mechanic
aeronauticsmechanic.specializations: Aerospace, Fixed Wing, LTA (blimp), Rotary Wing, Tilt Wing, Vector Thrust

armorer.name: Armorer
armorer.specializations: Armor, Artillery, Explosives, Firearms, Heavy Weapons, Weapon Accessories

artisan.name: Artisan
artisan.specializations: Carpentry, Guitars, Painting, Sculpture, other crafts

computer.name: Computer
computer.specializations: By program (Analyze, Edit, etc.), by device type (commlink, surveillance, media, etc.)

cybercombat.name: Cybercombat
cybercombat.specializations: By specific opponents (Persona icons, Agents, IC, Living Persona icons, Sprites, etc.)

datasearch.name: Data Search
datasearch.specializations: By source (Data Havens, Public Archives, News Indexes, Financial Records, etc.), by data type (Corporate, Celebrity Gossip, Street Rumors, Trid Footage, etc.)

demolitions.name: Demolitions
demolitions.specializations: Commercial Explosives, Defusing, Improvised Explosives, Plastic Explosives

hacking.name: Hacking
hacking.specializations: By program (Exploit, Sniffer, etc.), by device type (commlink, surveillance, media, etc.)

hardware.name: Hardware
hardware.specializations: By specific device (Commlinks, Maglocks, Sensors, etc.)

industrialmechanic.name: Industrial Mechanic
industrialmechanic.specializations: Electrical Power Systems, Hydraulics, Robotics, Structural, Welding

medicine.name: Medicine
medicine.specializations: Cosmetic Surgery, Extended Care, Implant Surgery, Magical Health, Organ Culture, Trauma Surgery

software.name: Software
software.specializations: Defensive Utilities, Offensive Utilities, Masking Utilities, Operational Utilities, Special Utilities (specify)

footer.p: In 2075, you'd have to be crazy to consider walking outside with just a tee-shirt and jeans, even in some of the nicer parts of the Sprawl. You need protection: from the acid rain, from air pollution, from ultraviolet radiation from the completely fragged ozone layer, and of course, from random street violence.
